nodes.text: Brett Tosti was part of the crew on the first two installments in the Dark Forces saga. First as the project coordinator, level designer, and lead tester on Star Wars: Dark Forces and the project manager, production manager, and level designer on Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II. Brett also worked as a producer on Star Wars: Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast and Star Wars: Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy. Brett also worked on quality assurance on Star Wars: Rebel Assault and came up with the concept for Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire. Another part of Star Wars he worked on was the first three Rogue Squadron installments, for Star Wars: Rogue Squadron for the N64 he was the project leader and production manager and for the sequel Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader, Brett was the producer. Brett also was a producer on Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike. Brett was the project leader on Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo. Brett was also the project leader and production manager on Star Wars Episode I: Racer. Brett also was the production manager on Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire. Brett also was the leader tester for Super Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back and worked on production and testing on Super Star Wars: Return of the Jedi. Brett also was a tester on Star Wars: TIE Fighter. Brett also was a tester on Star Wars: X-Wing.
